pageContext.claim: “The Philadelphia Eagles Football Team was invited to the White House. Unfortunately, only a small number of players decided to come, and we canceled the event. Staying in the Locker Room for the playing of our National Anthem is as disrespectful to our country as kneeling. Sorry!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests the team had challenged him on his stance on football players kneeling during the national anthem -- to silently protest  police brutality and racial inequality -- but no Eagles players had engaged in the practice.
